tool_description: This API compares and finds similarity between 2 face images. This is used to authenticate a person and detect an impersonation scenario.
title: Face Compare

api_list.name: Face compare
api_list.description:
IDfy’s Face Compare API ensures that the documents provided to you belong to the individuals you expect them to. Automate workflows by eliminating the need to manually eyeball and compare faces across multiple documents and selfies.

 

IDfy’s face compare API takes two images as inputs and returns a match score to help you take decisions faster.

Pair it with IDfy’s Liveness APIs to have complete confidence that the selfie of the individual is indeed live, and belongs to the same individual as you expect.

Use get call on the left and pass the request id to fetch api call results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://face-compare1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/compare/face"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "face-compare1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

import requests

url = "https://face-compare1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/compare/face"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "face-compare1.p.rapidapi.com"
